Name: Exemptions from the payment of fees for fire department permits and inspections.
Title: A Local Law to repeal section 27-4029 of the administrative code of the city of New York relating to exemptions from the payment of fees for fire department permits and inspections.
Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:
      Section 1.  Section 27-4029 of the administrative code of the city of New York is REPEALED.
      ï¿½2.  This local law shall take effect immediately.
